/**
 * TAF框架的服务端实现类
 * kevintian@tencent.com
 * 2014-10-28
 */
var TafProtocol  = require("@tencent/taf-rpc-jce").server;
var Endpoint     = require("@tencent/taf-utils").Endpoint;
var Configure    = require("@tencent/taf-utils").Config;
var Promise         = require("@tencent/taf-utils").Promise;
var TafMonitor   = require("@tencent/taf-monitor");
var Communicator = require("../client/Communicator.js").Communicator;
var BindAdapter  = require("./BindAdapter.js").BindAdapter;
var AuthProxy    = require("../auth/AuthProxy").taf.AuthProxy;
var AuthLogic = require("../auth/AuthLogic");
 
///////////////////////////////////////////////封装标准TAF服务//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
var HeroServer = function () {
    this._adapters       = [];          //当前服务上的所有绑定端口
    this._servants       = {};          //当前服务上的所有绑定端口对应的处理类
    this._configure      = undefined;
    this._configureFile  = "";
    this._communicator   = undefined;   //框架已经初始化的通信器
    this.Application     = "";
    this.ServerName      = "";
    this._authLocator     = ""; //鉴权服务地址
};
module.exports.HeroServer = HeroServer;
 
//创建一个BindAdapter的参数
HeroServer.BindAdapterOption = function () {
    this.endpoint     = "";         //必选。当前BindAdapter的监听地址，比如tcp -h 127.0.0.1 -p 14002 -t 10000
    this.name         = "";         //可选。当前BindAdapter的名字
    this.servant      = "";         //可选。当前BindAdapter上的Servant的名字
    this.maxconns     = 1024;       //可选。当前BindAdapter上可以支持的最大链接数
    this.protocolName = "taf";      //可选。当前BindAdapter上的协议解析器的名字
    this.protocol     = undefined;  //可选。当前BindAdapter上的协议解析器，如果不设置或者为"taf"则默认为TAF协议
    this.handleImp    = undefined;  //必选。当前BindAdapter上的请求处理类
    this._updateAkskInterval = undefined;//更新aksk的定时器
    this._updateAkskProxy    = undefined;//更新aksk的proxy
    this._updateAkskTime     = 60 * 60 * 1000; //每1小时更新一次aksk
};
 
//定义访问属性
HeroServer.prototype.__defineGetter__("communicator", function () { return this._communicator;});
 
HeroServer.prototype.__defineGetter__("configure", function () { return this._configure; });
 
//使用配置文件初始化服务
HeroServer.prototype.initialize = function ($sConfigFile, $initFunction) {
    this._configureFile = $sConfigFile;
    this._configure     = new Configure();
    this._configure.parseFile(this._configureFile);
    this._authLocator = this._configure.get("taf.application.server.authlocator", "");//taf.tafauth.AuthObj
    this._initializeClient(this._configureFile);
    this._initializeServer();
    TafMonitor.stat.init(this._configure.json);
    this.startUpdateAksk();
    $initFunction && $initFunction(this);
};
 
HeroServer.prototype.startUpdateAksk = function () {
    var self = this;
    Iif(self._authLocator){
        self._updateAkskProxy = self._communicator.stringToProxy(AuthProxy, self._authLocator);
        self._updateAkskInterval = setInterval(function () {
            var needAuthobjs = self._adapters.filter(function(obj){
                return obj.endpoint.hasOwnProperty("iAuthType") && obj.endpoint.iAuthType != AuthLogic.AUTH_TYPE.AUTH_TYPENONE;
            });
            needAuthobjs = needAuthobjs.map(function (obj) {
                return obj.name;
            });
            AuthLogic.refreshAksk(needAuthobjs, self);
        }, self._updateAkskTime);
 
    }
}
 
HeroServer.prototype.getUpdateAkskProxy= function(){
    return this._updateAkskProxy;
}
 
HeroServer.prototype.stopUpdateAksk = function () {
    if(this._updateAkskInterval){
        clearInterval(this._updateAkskInterval);
        this._updateAkskProxy.destroy();
        this._updateAkskInterval = undefined;
        this._updateAkskProxy = undefined;
    }
}
 
HeroServer.prototype.addServantAuthFn = function(servant, authFn){
    var bindAdaper = this._adapters.find(function (adapter) {
        return adapter.servant == servant;
    });
    if(bindAdaper){
        bindAdaper.setAuthFn(authFn);
        return;
    }
    throw new Error("can not find bindadapter of servant, please initialize server first, or check servant name");
}
 
HeroServer.prototype.getBindAdapterByName = function (name) {
    return this._adapters.find(function (adapter) {
        return adapter.name == name;
    });
}
 
//为服务Servant增加处理类
HeroServer.prototype.addServant = function ($ServantHandle, $ServantName) {
    this._servants[$ServantName] = $ServantHandle;
};
 
//启动服务
HeroServer.prototype.start = function (option) { //option的类型为：BindAdapterOption
    option && this._addBindAdapter(option);
    return this._waitForShutdown();
};
 
//停止服务
HeroServer.prototype.stop = function () {
    this._communicator && this._communicator.destroy(); //如果有初始化通信器，则把通信器关闭
 
    for (var i = 0; i < this._adapters.length; i++) {
        this._adapters[i].stop();
    }
    this._adapters.splice(0, this._adapters.length);
};
 
HeroServer.prototype._initializeClient = function ($sConfigFile) {
    this._communicator = Communicator.New();
    this._communicator.initialize($sConfigFile);
};
 
HeroServer.prototype._initializeServer = function () {
    this.Application = this._configure.get("taf.application.server.app");
    this.ServerName  = this._configure.get("taf.application.server.server");
 
    var svrList = this._configure.getDomain("taf.application.server");
    for (var i = 0, len = svrList.length; i < len; i++) {
        var config = this._configure.get("taf.application.server.<" + svrList[i] + ">");
 
        var option = new HeroServer.BindAdapterOption();
        option.name          = svrList[i];
        option.servant       = config.servant;
        option.endpoint      = config.endpoint;
        option.maxconns      = config.maxconns;
        option.protocolName  = config.protocol;
        option.protocol      = TafProtocol;
 
        var adapter = this._addBindAdapter(option);
        //注意：此处的secretkey在config中应该填写secretkey两次sha1后的hex串
        Eif(config.accesskey && config.secretkey){
            adapter.addAuthKeyMap(config.accesskey, config.secretkey);
        }
    }
};
 
//向服务中注册BindAdapter
HeroServer.prototype._addBindAdapter = function ($options) {
    var adapter = new BindAdapter();
    adapter.name          = $options.name;
    adapter.servantName   = $options.servant;
    adapter.endpoint      = Endpoint.parse($options.endpoint);
    adapter.maxconns      = $options.maxconns?$options.maxconns:1024;
    adapter.protocolName  = $options.protocolName;
    adapter.protocol      = adapter.isTafProtocol()?TafProtocol:$options.protocol;
 
    this._servants[adapter.servantName] = $options.handleImp;
    this._adapters.push(adapter);
    return adapter;
};
 
HeroServer.prototype._waitForShutdown = function () {
    var initializePromiseArray = [];
    for (var i = 0, len = this._adapters.length; i < len; i++) {
        //判断handleImp的initialize方法是否返回promise对象，支持server启动前的准备工作
        (function (){
            var adapter = this._adapters[i];
            adapter.handleImp = new this._servants[adapter.servantName]();
            adapter.handleImp.application = this;
            var promise = adapter.handleImp.initialize();
            Iif(promise && typeof promise.then == "function"){
                initializePromiseArray.push(promise.then(function (data) {
                    adapter.start();
                    return data;
                }));
            } else {
                adapter.start();
            }
        }).call(this);
    }
    Iif(initializePromiseArray.length > 0){
        return Promise.all(initializePromiseArray);
    }
};
 
///////////////////////////////////////////////封装简单TAF服务//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
var SimpleServer = function ($HandleImp) {
    this._server    = new HeroServer();
    this._handleImp = $HandleImp;
};
 
SimpleServer.prototype.start = function ($options) {
    var svroption = new HeroServer.BindAdapterOption();
    svroption.endpoint      = $options.endpoint;
    svroption.servant       = $options.servant;
    svroption.maxconns      = $options.maxconns;
    svroption.protocolName  = $options.protocol;
    svroption.handleImp     = $options.handleImp?$options.handleImp:this._handleImp;
 
    process.env.TAF_CONFIG && this._server._initializeClient(process.env.TAF_CONFIG);
    return this._server.start(svroption);
};
 
SimpleServer.prototype.stop = function () {
    this._server && this._server.stop();
};
 
///////////////////////////////////////////////对外提供的静态方法/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
HeroServer.createServer = function ($HandleImp) {
    return $HandleImp?(new SimpleServer($HandleImp)):(new HeroServer());
};
 
HeroServer.getServant = function ($sConfigFile, $ServantName) {
    var configure = new Configure();
    configure.parseFile($sConfigFile);
 
    var svrList  = configure.getDomain("taf.application.server");
    var servants = [];
    for (var i = 0, len = svrList.length; i < len; i++) {
        var config = configure.get("taf.application.server.<" + svrList[i] + ">");
        if ($ServantName && config.servant === $ServantName) {
            servants.push(config);
            break;
        }
 
        if ($ServantName === undefined) {
            servants.push(config);
        }
    }
 
    return servants;
};
